translations: 单调乏味，千篇一律；（声音或话语的）单调

sentences.sentence: After all the humiliation one suffered all the monotonies and losses the erasures and disintegrations after being constantly consumed by society was it a small reclamation of the self?
sentences.translation: 一个人在经受了那么多屈辱，单调乏味和失败，忘却和崩溃，在不断被这个社会销蚀而憔悴不堪之后，这是自我的一次小小救赎吗？
